task.title: Inviting others to an existing chat
task.shortdesc: If you are in a text chat with one chat partner, you can quickly invite someone from your contact list to join the chat. A chat with more than two chat partners is referred to as a group chat.

step.cmd: In an open chat window, click .
Type a name for the group in the Group name field.
In the Search for invitees field, enter the first few letters of the name.
step.info: Click the name that you want to invite from the list of matching contacts. Repeat to add others to the Invitees list.

step.cmd: Click Create and an invite is sent to the list of invitees. The recipients are added to the chat when they accept the invitation.
